question: What is the name of the recently launched scheme that aims to provide nutritional support to pregnant women and adolescent girls?
explanation:
Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla recently launched \"Suposhit Maa Abhiyan\", that aims to provide nutritional support to pregnant women and adolescent girls.
The scheme was launched in Kota, Rajasthan which is also the Speakerâ€™s parliamentary constituency. Union Minister of Women and Child Development Smriti Irani also attended the launch programme.
